        public java.util.List<DataStoreNamedRelatedResourceRep> list()

        API Call: GET /vdc/data-stores

        Returns:
        References to data stores.

      • getAll

        Returns:
        Returns all data store objects.

      • deactivate

        public Task<DataStoreRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id)
        Begins deactivating a data store by ID.

        API Call: POST /vdc/data-stores/{id}/deactivate

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the data store to deactivate.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

        Returns:
        Task for monitoring progress of the operation.

      • updateOnFileSystem

                      ModifyDataStoreParam param)
        Updates a filesystem data store.

        API Call: PUT /vdc/data-stores/filesystems/{id}

        Parameters:
        id - Identifier of the data store.
        param - Update parameters.

      • get

        public DataStoreRestRep get(DataStoreNamedRelatedResourceRep ref)
        Convenience call to retrieve an NFS Export or filesystem data store by reference.

        API Client: GET /vdc/data-stores/nfsexportpoints/{id}, GET /vdc/data-stores/filesystems/{id}

        Parameters:
        ref - Reference to the data store.
        Returns:
        The data store.
